import React, { Component } from 'react' import './about.css' class About extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state={ critic:false, pCo:false, firstName:"" }; this.nameChange=this.nameChange.bind(this); } basic() { this.setState({ critic:false, pCo:false }); } pCo() { this.setState({ critic:false, pCo:true }); } critic() { this.setState({ critic:true, pCo:false }); alert(this.state.firstName); } nameChange(event) { this.setState({firstName:event.target.value}); } render() { return (
{ this.state.pCo? :null } { this.state.critic || this.state.pCo? :null }
) } } export default About
